name: Keep the Threats Away
description:
• Submission to the Cybersecurity Game Jam 2021;
  • This is a conceptual game, audio based only;
  • To play it, you will only need your keyboard and a pair of headphones;
  • The game uses binaural sound to indicate threat positions;
  • The game is self-narrated;
  • The game is still incomplete, and some aspects can be improved;
I apologize in advance for any bugs or English errors Comments and suggestions for improvements are welcome!
